entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Papineau
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 6:27 PM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Freezing Drizzle, -5.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Gatineau Airport 6:53 PM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023
Condition: Light Freezing Drizzle
Temperature: -5.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.1 kPa falling
Visibility: 12.9 km
Humidity: 90 %
Wind Chill: -10
Dewpoint: -7.3°C
Wind: E 9 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: Snow changing to periods of drizzle this evening and ending near midnight then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle this evening. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 10 this evening. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 1. Wind chill near minus 8. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 10.
